ExpenditureResponsibilityGrp.PurposeOfGrantTxt: SUPPORT FOR AFRICAN FOOD CHANGEMAKERS PROGRAMS: 1) BUILDING RESILIENCE AGAINST CLIMATE & ENVIRONMENTAL SHOCKS (BRACE) WHICH AIMS TO SUPPORT AFRICAN SMALL AND MEDIUM ENTERPRISES ENGAGED IN THE FOOD AND AGRICULTURAL LANDSCAPE (AGRISMES) TO BUILD, STRENGTHEN, AND INCORPORATE CLIMATE ADOPTION BEST PRACTICES AND RESILIENCE INTO THEIR BUSINESS MODELS, AND 2) THE 25 LEADING WOMEN IN FOOD AND AGRICULTURE FELLOWSHIP PROGRAM WHICH AIMS TO AMPLIFY, CELEBRATE, CHAMPION AND ADVANCE THE WORK OF 25 AFRICAN WOMEN SMES IN THE AGRIBUSINESS LANDSCAPE THROUGH RECOGNITION AND ACCESS TO CRITICAL RESOURCES.

BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: ARTS AT THE OLD FIRE STATION

ExpenditureResponsibilityGrp.PurposeOfGrantTxt: GRANT SUPPORT FOR A SOCIAL ENTREPRENEUR-FOCUSED CONFERENCE THAT HAPPENS CONCURRENTLY WITH THE SKOLL WORLD FORUM. THE PRIMARY GOAL IS TO ALLOW THE SKOLL COMMUNITY A VENUE TO CURATE THEIR OWN CONTENT. A SECONDARY GOAL IS TO EXPAND REACH BY HELPING MARMALADE BECOME A SPACE WHERE SKOLL WORLD FORUM DELEGATES AND NON-SKOLL WORLD FORUM DELEGATES ALIKE CAN ACCESS LIVE-STREAMED PLENARY SESSIONS, NETWORK, AND ENGAGE IN COMMUNITY.

EQUITY-BASED INVESTMENT IN REDEEMABLE SHARES IN A MAURITIUS LIMITED LIABILITY COMPANY. LOAN TO WATERCREDIT INVESTMENT FUND TO PROVIDE DEBT CAPITAL TO MICROFINANCE INSTITUTIONS IN INDIA WHO WILL THEN ON-LEND TO POOR BORROWERS TO IMPROVE WATER AND SANITATION ACCESS AND QUALITY.

$1.5M IN A BULLET PAYMENT TOWARDS THE $50M WATEREQUITY INVESTMENT FUND 3, WHICH WILL: A) ONLEND TO LOCAL FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS WHO WILL PROVIDE LOANS TO LOW-INCOME BORROWERS; AND B) INVEST IN SMALL AND MEDIUM ENTERPRISES IN THE WATER SUPPLY AND SANITATION SPACE. THE FUND WILL OPERATE IN INDIA, CAMBODIA, INDONESIA AND THE PHILIPPINES
TO THE KNOWLEDGE OF THE FOUNDATION, NO PART OF THE GRANT HAS BEEN USED FOR ANYTHING OTHER OTHER THAN ITS INTENDED PURPOSE, SO NO INDEPENDENT VERIFICATION WAS REQUIRED OR DONE.
